Package il.ac.hit.CashFlowManagement.model

Interface IJDBCDataBaseLogic<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
JDBCDataBaseLogic
public interface IJDBCDataBaseLogic<T>
this interface define the operations that the JDBCDataBaseLogic must implement

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean createTableIfNotExist​(@NotNull java.lang.String nameOfTable, @NotNull java.lang.String... parameters)  
    void insertValue​(@NotNull java.lang.String nameOfTable, java.lang.String parameters)
    Insert a values into a table in the DB

    Execute DB Query
    void removeTable​(@NotNull java.lang.String nameOfTable)

  • Method Details

    • createTableIfNotExist

      boolean createTableIfNotExist​(@NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String nameOfTable, @NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String... parameters) throws JDBCDataBaseLogicException
      Parameters:
      nameOfTable - name of the table
      parameters - parameter to Create
      Returns:
      true if a new table created, false if the table is already exists
      Throws:
      JDBCDataBaseLogicException - if failed to create table because params is not even or SQLException

    • removeTable

      void removeTable​(@NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String nameOfTable) throws JDBCDataBaseLogicException
      Remove table from DB query (DROP TABLE SQL query)
      Parameters:
      nameOfTable - table name to remove, can't be null
      Throws:
      JDBCDataBaseLogicException - if failed to remove table because of SQLException

    • insertValue

      void insertValue​(@NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String nameOfTable, java.lang.String parameters) throws InsertToDBException
      Insert a values into a table in the DB
      Parameters:
      nameOfTable - name of the table, can't be null
      parameters - row parameters to insert, can't be null
      Throws:
      InsertToDBException - if failed to insert value to table because of SQLException

    • query

      java.sql.ResultSet query​(@NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String query) throws JDBCDataBaseLogicException
      Execute DB Query
      Parameters:
      query - query to be executed, can't be null
      Returns:
      ResultSet object that contains the results of the SQL query executing
      Throws:
      JDBCDataBaseLogicException - if failed to execute query because of SQLException
